paragraphs.content: Psalm 119
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 119

paragraphs.content: א Aleph
paragraphs.contentHtml: א Aleph

paragraphs.content: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.

paragraphs.content: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.

paragraphs.content: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!
paragraphs.contentHtml: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!

paragraphs.content: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.

paragraphs.content: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.

paragraphs.content: ב Beth
paragraphs.contentHtml: ב Beth

paragraphs.content: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.

paragraphs.content: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

paragraphs.content: Blessed art thou, O LORD: teach me thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed art thou, O Lord: teach me thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.

paragraphs.content: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.

paragraphs.content: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.

paragraphs.content: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word.

paragraphs.content: ג Gimel
paragraphs.contentHtml: ג Gimel

paragraphs.content: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live, and keep thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live, and keep thy word.

paragraphs.content: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.

paragraphs.content: I am a stranger in the earth: hide not thy commandments from me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am a stranger in the earth: hide not thy commandments from me.

paragraphs.content: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, which do err from thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, which do err from thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.

paragraphs.content: ד Daleth
paragraphs.contentHtml: ד Daleth

paragraphs.content: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.

paragraphs.content: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.

paragraphs.content: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.

paragraphs.content: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.

paragraphs.content: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.

paragraphs.content: I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O LORD, put me not to shame.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O Lord, put me not to shame.

paragraphs.content: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.

paragraphs.content: ה He
paragraphs.contentHtml: ה He

paragraphs.content: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Teach me, O Lord, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.

paragraphs.content: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.

paragraphs.content: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.

paragraphs.content: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.

paragraphs.content: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.

paragraphs.content: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.

paragraphs.content: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.

paragraphs.content: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.

paragraphs.content: ו Vau
paragraphs.contentHtml: ו Vau

paragraphs.content: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O LORD, even thy salvation, according to thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O Lord, even thy salvation, according to thy word.

paragraphs.content: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.

paragraphs.content: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.

paragraphs.content: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.

paragraphs.content: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.

paragraphs.content: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved.

paragraphs.content: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: ז Zain
paragraphs.contentHtml: ז Zain

paragraphs.content: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

paragraphs.content: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.

paragraphs.content: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.

paragraphs.content: I remembered thy judgments of old, O LORD; and have comforted myself.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I remembered thy judgments of old, O Lord; and have comforted myself.

paragraphs.content: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.

paragraphs.content: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.

paragraphs.content: I have remembered thy name, O LORD, in the night, and have kept thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have remembered thy name, O Lord, in the night, and have kept thy law.

paragraphs.content: This I had, because I kept thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This I had, because I kept thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: ח Cheth
paragraphs.contentHtml: ח Cheth

paragraphs.content: Thou art my portion, O LORD: I have said that I would keep thy words.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou art my portion, O Lord: I have said that I would keep thy words.

paragraphs.content: I entreated thy favour with my whole heart: be merciful unto me according to thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I entreated thy favour with my whole heart: be merciful unto me according to thy word.

paragraphs.content: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.

paragraphs.content: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments.

paragraphs.content: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: The earth, O LORD, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The earth, O Lord, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: ט Teth
paragraphs.contentHtml: ט Teth

paragraphs.content: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O LORD, according unto thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O Lord, according unto thy word.

paragraphs.content: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.

paragraphs.content: Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.

paragraphs.content: Their heart is as fat as grease; but I delight in thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Their heart is as fat as grease; but I delight in thy law.

paragraphs.content: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.

paragraphs.content: י Jod
paragraphs.contentHtml: י Jod

paragraphs.content: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.

paragraphs.content: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I know, O Lord, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.

paragraphs.content: Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, according to thy word unto thy servant.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, according to thy word unto thy servant.

paragraphs.content: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live: for thy law is my delight.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live: for thy law is my delight.

paragraphs.content: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; that I be not ashamed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; that I be not ashamed.

paragraphs.content: כ Caph
paragraphs.contentHtml: כ Caph

paragraphs.content: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.

paragraphs.content: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?

paragraphs.content: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?
paragraphs.contentHtml: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?

paragraphs.content: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.

paragraphs.content: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.

paragraphs.content: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.

paragraphs.content: ל Lamed
paragraphs.contentHtml: ל Lamed

paragraphs.content: For ever, O LORD, thy word is settled in heaven.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For ever, O Lord, thy word is settled in heaven.

paragraphs.content: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.

paragraphs.content: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.

paragraphs.content: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.

paragraphs.content: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.

paragraphs.content: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: I have seen an end of all perfection: but thy commandment is exceeding broad.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have seen an end of all perfection: but thy commandment is exceeding broad.

paragraphs.content: מ Mem
paragraphs.contentHtml: מ Mem

paragraphs.content: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.

paragraphs.content: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.

paragraphs.content: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.

paragraphs.content: I understand more than the ancients, because I keep thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I understand more than the ancients, because I keep thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.

paragraphs.content: I have not departed from thy judgments: for thou hast taught me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have not departed from thy judgments: for thou hast taught me.

paragraphs.content: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
paragraphs.contentHtml: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

paragraphs.content: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.

paragraphs.content: נ Nun
paragraphs.contentHtml: נ Nun

paragraphs.content: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

paragraphs.content: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.

paragraphs.content: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O LORD, according unto thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O Lord, according unto thy word.

paragraphs.content: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, and teach me thy judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O Lord, and teach me thy judgments.

paragraphs.content: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.

paragraphs.content: The wicked have laid a snare for me: yet I erred not from thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The wicked have laid a snare for me: yet I erred not from thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.

paragraphs.content: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway, even unto the end.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway, even unto the end.

paragraphs.content: ס Samech
paragraphs.contentHtml: ס Samech

paragraphs.content: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.

paragraphs.content: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.

paragraphs.content: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.

paragraphs.content: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.

paragraphs.content: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: for their deceit is falsehood.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: for their deceit is falsehood.

paragraphs.content: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.

paragraphs.content: ע Ain
paragraphs.contentHtml: ע Ain

paragraphs.content: I have done judgment and justice: leave me not to mine oppressors.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have done judgment and justice: leave me not to mine oppressors.

paragraphs.content: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.

paragraphs.content: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.

paragraphs.content: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: It is time for thee, LORD, to work: for they have made void thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: It is time for thee, Lord, to work: for they have made void thy law.

paragraphs.content: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.

paragraphs.content: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.

paragraphs.content: פ Pe
paragraphs.contentHtml: פ Pe

paragraphs.content: Thy testimonies are wonderful: therefore doth my soul keep them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy testimonies are wonderful: therefore doth my soul keep them.

paragraphs.content: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.

paragraphs.content: I opened my mouth, and panted: for I longed for thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I opened my mouth, and panted: for I longed for thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.

paragraphs.content: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.

paragraphs.content: Deliver me from the oppression of man: so will I keep thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Deliver me from the oppression of man: so will I keep thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; and teach me thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; and teach me thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.

paragraphs.content: צ Tzaddi
paragraphs.contentHtml: צ Tzaddi

paragraphs.content: Righteous art thou, O LORD, and upright are thy judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Righteous art thou, O Lord, and upright are thy judgments.

paragraphs.content: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.

paragraphs.content: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.

paragraphs.content: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.

paragraphs.content: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.

paragraphs.content: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.

paragraphs.content: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.

paragraphs.content: ק Koph
paragraphs.contentHtml: ק Koph

paragraphs.content: I cried with my whole heart; hear me, O LORD: I will keep thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I cried with my whole heart; hear me, O Lord: I will keep thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: I cried unto thee; save me, and I shall keep thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I cried unto thee; save me, and I shall keep thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.

paragraphs.content: Mine eyes prevent the night watches, that I might meditate in thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mine eyes prevent the night watches, that I might meditate in thy word.

paragraphs.content: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O LORD, quicken me according to thy judgment.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O Lord, quicken me according to thy judgment.

paragraphs.content: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.

paragraphs.content: Thou art near, O LORD; and all thy commandments are truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou art near, O Lord; and all thy commandments are truth.

paragraphs.content: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.

paragraphs.content: ר Resh
paragraphs.contentHtml: ר Resh

paragraphs.content: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.

paragraphs.content: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.

paragraphs.content: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: Great are thy tender mercies, O LORD: quicken me according to thy judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Great are thy tender mercies, O Lord: quicken me according to thy judgments.

paragraphs.content: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.

paragraphs.content: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.

paragraphs.content: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O LORD, according to thy lovingkindness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O Lord, according to thy lovingkindness.

paragraphs.content: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: ש Schin
paragraphs.contentHtml: ש Schin

paragraphs.content: Princes have persecuted me without a cause: but my heart standeth in awe of thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Princes have persecuted me without a cause: but my heart standeth in awe of thy word.

paragraphs.content: I rejoice at thy word, as one that findeth great spoil.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I rejoice at thy word, as one that findeth great spoil.

paragraphs.content: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.

paragraphs.content: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.

paragraphs.content: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

paragraphs.content: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lord, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.

paragraphs.content: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.

paragraphs.content: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.

paragraphs.content: ת Tau
paragraphs.contentHtml: ת Tau

paragraphs.content: Let my cry come near before thee, O LORD: give me understanding according to thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let my cry come near before thee, O Lord: give me understanding according to thy word.

paragraphs.content: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.

paragraphs.content: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.

paragraphs.content: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.

paragraphs.content: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.

paragraphs.content: I have longed for thy salvation, O LORD; and thy law is my delight.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have longed for thy salvation, O Lord; and thy law is my delight.

paragraphs.content: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.

paragraphs.content: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
